destiny.core

Class FadeGif

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.core.FadeGif

  • public class FadeGif
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the existing PGif class and adds fading functionality to it
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FadeGif(PGif gif)
      create a FadeGif from PGif object
      FadeGif(PGif gif, float startTint, float targetTint, float fadeSpeed) 
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname, float startTint, float targetTint, float fadeSpeed)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path and fade speed and opacities
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname, float startTint, float targetTint, float fadeSpeed, int xCord, int yCord)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path and fade speed and opacities and top left corner coordinates
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname, float startTint, float targetTint, float fadeSpeed, int xCord, int yCord, int width, int height)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path and desired dimension of the GIF and fade speed and opacities
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname, int x, int y)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path and desired top left corner
      FadeGif(java.lang.String pathname, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      create a FadeGif by retrieving a GIF from a path and desired dimension of the GIF
